testcase.name: Search and purchase smartwatches from multiple brands - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I wait for the Amazon homepage to load completely.....................passed Then I should see the Amazon page title contains "Amazon"...................passed When I search for "smartwatches" in the search box..........................passed And I click on the search button............................................passed Then I should see search results for smartwatches...........................passed When I apply brand filter for "Noise".......................................passed And I set price filter with minimum price "1000" and maximum price "5000"...passed Then all displayed smartwatches should have prices between "1000" and "5000" rupees.passed When I sort the search results by price from high to low....................passed And I click on the product with the highest price...........................passed Then the product details page should open in a new window...................passed When I switch to the new product window.....................................passed And I verify the product details are displayed..............................passed And I add the product to my cart............................................passed And the cart count should be updated........................................passed When I close the new window and return to main window.......................passed Then I should be back on the search results page............................passed
